value: //on first call we need load next page

// set open cases to undefined as the script is triggered when click on load more cases button
// and to prevent this block of code from being executed (prevent resetting the displayedOpenCases)
// add next page of groups to the list of next groups to display
// display the next groups from the memory
// when there are no more groups in the memory

return uiTranslate("An error has occurred. For more information, check the log file.");
// After a group is successfully edited

//on first call we need load next page
// diplay the first page of users on page load or when the filters change
// set the next page to be requested to 2 since the first page is in the memory
// saving the other half to be displayed later
// set users to undefined as the script is triggered when click on load more users button
// and to prevent this block of code from being executed (prevent resetting the displayedUsers)
// add next page of users to the list of next users to display
// display the next users from the memory

//on first call we need load next page
// diplay the first page of subGroups on page load or when the filters change

// saving the other half to be displayed later
// set subGroups to undefined as the script is triggered when click on load more subGroups button

// display the next subGroups from the memory

return uiTranslate("A group with the same name already exists.");
return uiTranslate("Access denied. For more information, check the log file.");

description: This page provides the list of a group. It is dedicated to Admin-like profiles. You can export it and edit it in the UI Designer.
